description:
Located in Peoria, Illinois, the law office of Joel E. Brown, Attorney at Law, provides unmatched counsel and support to clients across our region who suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one because of another party's negligence or wrongdoing. A top-ranked trial lawyer with more than 28 years of total legal experience, attorney Joel E. Brown established our law firm with a mission to deliver the highest level of advocacy possible to individuals and families suffering needlessly as the result of any of the following:

  • Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
  • Pedestrian and bicycle accidents
  • Construction and workplace accidents
  • Defective products
  • Talcum powder and Zofran litigation
  • Defective drugs and medical devices
  • Other preventable tragedies

No matter the cause of your suffering, you can rely on Mr. Brown to sit with you and fully discuss your options to help you make the best-informed decisions. He will fight aggressively on your behalf both inside and outside the courtroom to increase your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation to which you are entitled.

To date, we have recovered millions of dollars for our plaintiff clients, and we have gained a reputation for our outstanding legal skills and knowledge along with our unwavering commitment to those we serve. Honored for our success, Mr. Brown has earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from his peers, and our law firm has enjoyed countless testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

To begin the process of obtaining justice in the wake of an avoidable accident or some other tortious claim, you can contact Joel E. Brown, Attorney at Law, to schedule a free initial consultation. In these uncertain times, we also offer virtual consultations in an attempt to keep you and your family members safe and healthy.
